-- create database
CREATE DATABASE salesdb

--password encyption
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Xyz@123synapse';

--create sasToken
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL SasToken
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = 'sv=2024-11-04&ss=b&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacyx&se=2025-07-10T09:19:34Z&st=2025-07-04T01:19:34Z&spr=https&sig=Th4CjWDxlzWDsgs96TBQ%2B1Nlptom5HqOH2BqONs0%2BEI%3D';

-- Create an external data source
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ExtDataSrc
WITH (LOCATION = 'https://sasynapsedemodl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/',
CREDENTIAL = SasToken);

-- create a file format
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT TextFileFormat WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
        FIRST_ROW = 2
    )
)

-- create external table
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE orders(
    order_id BIGINT,
    order_date NVARCHAR(4000),
    customer_id BIGINT,
    order_status NVARCHAR(4000)
)
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'orders.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExtDataSrc,
    FILE_FORMAT = TextFileFormat
)
GO

-- query the data
SELECT * FROM orders

SELECT order_status, COUNT(*) FROM orders GROUP BY order_status;

drop EXTERNAL TABLE orders

DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ExtDataSrc

DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT TextFileFormat

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 FIRST_ROW = 2,
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raw_sasynapsedemodl_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raw_sasynapsedemodl_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://raw@sasynapsedemodl.dfs.core.windows.net', 
		TYPE = HADOOP 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.orders_ext (
	[order_id] bigint,
	[order_date] NVARCHAR(4000),
	[order_customer_id] bigint,
	[order_status] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'orders.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [raw_sasynapsedemodl_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.orders_ext
GO
